string.value: The passwords are different. Please try again.

string.value: The user name and password cannot be null.

string.value: The user name, password, and confirm password cannot be empty.

string.name: message_name_tip
string.value: The user name is 1-14 characters long, including letters, numbers, and underscores, or a combination of these characters

string.name: message_password_tip
string.value: The password is 4 to 14 digits, letters, or! @ $#% ^ & * combination
